thread.title: slaps anti-dumping measures on some synthetic rubber imports

author: cnbc.com
title: slaps anti-dumping measures on some synthetic rubber imports
text:
China slaps anti-dumping measures on synthetic rubber imports from US, EU and Singapore Published 9 Hours Ago Reuters Keith Bedford | Bloomberg | Getty Images 
China will impose temporary anti-dumping measures on halogenated butyl rubber imported from the United States, European Union and Singapore, the commerce ministry said on Thursday. 
The anti-dumping measures will be effective from April 20, the ministry said. 
Exxon Mobil Corp is among companies in the list affected by the rubber duties.
